title: Flower Pot Lamp Black
body: Flower Pot lamp was designed by Verner Panton in 1969. Its organic form consists of two half spheres of different sizes tucked into each other embodies several abstract concepts in a singular body of design. Verner marked it all the next year with the FlowerPot series of table and pendant lights. Spherical, bold and modern, they are as fresh looking now as they were in 1969.
